text:
It's Steve and Maggie. Happy Halloween.
Haha.

This will be lovely. Hoho. Oh, hey, hello boys 
and girls. Hey Steve. Let's play trick or treat.

No Maggie, it's Halloween tonight and it's scary 
out there. Oh... So I'm staying here to enjoy a

relaxing bath. Where's my towel. Hey boys and 
girls. Let's play a Halloween trick on Steve.

Hehe. Abracadabra! Oh!
Oh.

Hey. Where am I? And what am I? Hoho. Look 
I'm a pirate. Aggrrr. Great. Oh and I'm on

a pirate ship. Haha! Come on boys and 
girls let's sail the seven seas. Yeah!

I am out at sea for Halloween,
what sea monsters can be seen.

Look to the left, look to the right,
what monsters are out tonight. Haha.

Oh this is great, boys and girls, on a pirate 
ship out at sea, let's look for some sea monsters.

What can we see? Oh there's nothing here. 
There's nothing there. There's nothing anywhere.

Wait what?!
You saw something?

Really? Oh I can't see anything. Oh.
Can you help me boys and girls?

Shout out when you see something. Oh.
There it is. I see it! It's a shark. Yeah look.

It's a shark. It's a shark. It's a shark.
Wow it's a big shark.

Oh and it’s getting closer and closer and closer.
Oh, where did it go? Can you see the

shark boys and girls
Where is that shark?

That was a big scary shark.
Wasn't it boys and girls. And I don't like sharks.

But come on let's be brave pirates. Aggrrr. 
And continue to sail across the seven seas.

I am out at sea for Halloween,
what sea monsters can be seen.

Look to the left, look to the right,
what monsters are out tonight. Haha.

Shiver me timbers.
You're not scared of any sea monsters are you. No!

So let's see what's our there now. Oh. 
And remember to shout out if you see

something. Oh. Haha. Yeah! A killer whale. This 
will be fun. Hehe. Did you see something. Oh.

Look at that! What sea monster does something like 
that? Oh now I can see a tail! It's a big tail! It

must be a big sea monster. What is it? Oh it's a 
whale, a killer whale. Look at that killer whale

boys and girls! Look at the killer whale. Look at 
the killer whale splashing about in the sea. Hoho.

It's a big killer whale, isn't it boys and 
girls. Oh. It's getting bigger and bigger

and bigger. Oh, I hope it doesn't get too close to 
our pirate ship. Oh it's gone. Wow! Hoho. No. Look

at me boys and girls. Oh, I think we should 
get out of here in case that killer whale

does it again. Hoist the mainsail.
I am out at sea for Halloween,

what sea monsters can be seen.
Look to the left, look to the right,

what monsters are out tonight. Haha.
Yo ho ho and some bubble gum.

Come on, let's take another look out 
to sea. Oh. And remember to shout out,

if you see something. Aaaaah! There's a 
crab. Oh! A really big crab. It’s huge,

it's massive, it's a mutant crab, look look 
look. Oh look. Oh. It's not a huge crab no.

It's a teeny tiny crab. Oh come Mr Crab. Let's 
get you back into the sea. Haha. Oh. Haha.

A giant squid. Yeah! This will be 
scary hehehehe. Oh nothing there,

nothing there, nothing anywhere. Oh, hey. It’s 
getting a bit rough. Can you help me boys and

girls by shouting out when you can see something. 
Oh, you can see something. Where? Over there?
Over there? Where? Oh, behind me? Really? Oh!

Oh look. There’s a giant squid. There’s a 
giant squid. There’s a giant squid. Ahhhh!

Oh hehe. That was very strange but let’s 
not stay here longer than we have to.

NO. Let’s continue on our pirate ship 
adventure. Hee hooo and off we go.

I am out at sea for Halloween,
what sea monsters can be seen.

Look to the left, look to the right,
what monsters are out tonight. Haha.

Mateys how are your sea legs. Haha.
Oh look. Land ahoy. Hey! That’s not land.

What is it? No! That’s impossible. It can’t 
be. It couldn’t be. It shouldn’t be. Look,

it’s a rubber duck! A rubber duck? A rubber 
duck?! Out here? At sea? That’s just crazy.

Wait a minute… that’s Maggie Magic. Isn’t it? 
Haha! Maggie! Did you enjoy my Halloween trick?

Yes. It was a lot of fun. You naughty naughty 
bird. Ok. Abracadabra! Haha. What a crazy
